data.message:
Wait a minute guys,l'm l the only one seeing this???
This official em's  page had 92 million followers in total just to be precise.

And since his devastating vicious anti Trump free style at the 2017 B.E.T hip hop awards cypher a few weeks ago l've noticed a rapid decrease of his stans unliking his page and now its 89 million followers point something left on this page...

Can somebody tell me the reason why?
Or is it because 75 percent of his fans are big time Trump followers?...

I honestly don't know...

replies.message: The ones who unliked are snowflakes. Who are overly sensitive. That couldn't stand to hear his thoughts and views because they contradicted theirs. Em was talking about a fucking civil servant who is a bonafide asshole (our president, the one WE elected, who works for US), not the messiah or god lol.
